messages.title: The Tories don't care about the NHS or the North East
messages.content: After a decade of investment and improvement under Labour we're now back to the bad old days.

messages.title: For the many not the few
messages.content: On Thursday I'm voting Labour to stand up for the NHS and the North East.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to stand up for the National Health Service and oppose the Conservatives' handling of it.

issues.economy: I remember the 80's when the Tories trashed our region by closing industries, destroying jobs, wrecking families and whole communities.
issues.health: I remember when the Tories were in last time - you waited ages for an operation and hospitals were crumbling. Now that I work in the NHS I can see that the Tories just don't get it. They don't believe in it being there for all of us when we need it, no matter what.

leaflet.personalStatement: I remember the 80's when the Tories trashed our region by closing industries, destroying jobs, wrecking families and whole communities. They left a scar across the North East that has not yet truly healed.

contactInformation.address: Labour Party, FREEPOST, NEA5728, Keir Hardie House, Newcastle Upon Tyne, NE1 1BR

quotes.text: The Tories don't care about the NHS or the North East. On June 8th, vote for a strong local Labour MP.

images.caption: Our children lived through the best investment in and improvement in NHS services.
